name: James
text: Mod pizza is great all around but this location has their stuff together! I‚Äôve been back multiple times and never have been disappointed. Great customer service, great pizza, and great environment.

name: Irena Eats
text: Great pizza experience!  I got the Dylan James and the Dominic! I really enjoyed the blackberry lemonade! I‚Äôm looking forward to the restaurant being opened to the public on January 13th!

name: Monique D
text: Delicious, first time having pizza made using cauliflower. Thank you guys for the experience. It was Randolph middle fundraiser night and The manager and staff were the best !

name: Clifford Thomas
text: Restaurant is clean. Employees always greet customers walking through the door and the engagement is one of the best through many restaurants that I visit frequently. Keep up the great work management. Happy employees equals happy guest.

name: Vignesh Reddy
text:
Nice place with
Friendly staff.

name: Bailey Grevling
text: The corporate office should consider an update to the online order process to show how long it's going to take until your pizza is done, but the employees here were cheerful and courteous even when slammed and being yelled at by tense customers.

name: Dany Williams
text: Love how many options they have! One time they got one of the orders wrong but they went above and beyond to fix the situation and gave us a gift certificate!  Mistakes happen, but we are still repeat customers.  This is the perfect place to meet up with other friends with small kids too (maybe after the pandemic is over?).

name: Gina Langteau
text: Staff is always nice. sometimes it's busy, but they keep up! well worth it

name: jay p
text: Great pizza! Employees are attentive and helpful.

text: I've been to this location twice this year and  both times, they did not get my order right. Both times, I asked for one of their signature pizzas, and they missed the key ingredients. ‚Ä¶More

text: I liked the pizza.  They have two individual sizes which is nice.  They didn't however have all the toppings I like in particular banana peppers.  Although they have a sweet spicy red pepper that was tasty.  All in all decent fare. The one ‚Ä¶More

text: Really good pizza and the staff is always great. Definitely worth a try if you haven't been yet!

name: ann slaughter
text: Your choice of everything! Thin and crispy sauce is great and toppings are too! Don't miss this place. Great prices and really quick service. They do have beer specials

text: Pizza is good but the staff has no personality. Felt like I walked into a third world country or they just didn‚Äôt want to be working. Regardless I won‚Äôt be coming back it really brought me down and felt unappreciated. Fyi

text: Amazing food, very fun staff. I'm never disappointed when I go to Modd

text: EXCELLENT gluten free pizza crust. Perfectly chewy and crunchy. I ordered the Lucy Sunshine and it was super yummy.
